name: honey buns
description:
**honey buns was made in less than a week by two overachieving queer women using RPG Maker for the Women In Games' September 2021 Game Jam. as a result, it's extremely unfinished with questionable placeholder art, quest testing cheats, and only the final potions main quest implemented. we hope despite all of these shortcomings, you have a pleasant time!

⊱ ────── {⋅.  .⋅} ────── ⊰

welcome to honeycrest! if all goes to plan, you won't be here for much longer.

⊱ ────── {⋅. .⋅} ────── ⊰

help a lovesick bunnie get the girl and the apprenticeship she's been dreaming of.

 current features:

 original art & story

 visual novel-inspired heavy dialogue

 sapphic & a mostly female-and-one-nonbinary cast

 unfinished/originally planned features:

 fight or sweet talk your way through your quests

 self-esteem & confidence based combat

 lesbian star(and species)-crossed lovers! (with a happy ending)

⊱ ────── {⋅. .⋅} ────── ⊰

 instructions to play:

honey buns is a wip and therefore kind of messy to get around in right now. 

the default rpg maker controls are in use, with the arrow keys being movement and selection, space/enter key being the confirm button, and the esc key being to cancel and open the menu.
